name: Highway Hero
description:
Highway Hero

You're driving along a bridge when you get a phone call from your wife. You answer it. Her water has broken. These idiot drivers are going too slow. 

It's time to take it up a notch.

Features

  • An endless runner, you can keep going forever!
  • A shop where you can buy new cosmetic cars
  • Local high-score

Default Controls

  • A/Left arrow to move left
  • D/Right arrow to move right

System Requirements

  • This build has only been confirmed to work on Windows 10. Use this for maximum compatibility.
  • A Keyboard and mouse.

Credits

  • Myxerman - Simple Cars Pack 
  • Unity Technologies - Post Processing

  •  Dynamic Art - Low Poly Street Pack
